subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Tonalist, the 3-1 favorite, won the $1 million Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont Park, beating Zivo by one and three-quarters lengths, with Long River third.
snippet: Tonalist, the 3-1 favorite, won the $1 million Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont Park, beating Zivo by one and three-quarters lengths, with Long River third.
